string: 内容
content
After all this time preparing, this is so exciting!
We have enough space now. Let's start building!
Select Cinema to build.
We need to clear some space for Film Studio. Let's expand the top floor again!
We have enough space now. Let's start building!
Select Film Studio to build.
Let's start filming!
Take a look at available screenplays!
Don't forget to consider what genres your actors are good at.
Which style should we aim for? If it matches the screenplay, the film will be greatly improved.
You can collect revenue here!
Let's expand the top floor to add a Green Room!
We have enough space now. Let's start building!
Let's enter the Green Room!
Our talent scouts are already busy working! Let's check out their reports!
Let's look at the candidate list!
We can sign contracts with any of these actors as long as you think they are suitable.
Let's enter the Green Room!
Choose the actor you want to upgrade.
You can upgrade the selected actor here!
Let's expand our top floor to make room for a Marketing Department!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Now let's hit the streets and start promoting our movie!
You can assign one of your actors as a spokesperson to boost audience interest!
Alright, now we are ready to promote!
Let's upgrade the Marketing Department!
Here you can view the box office records for our current movies.
Use flyers to increase a movie's buzz.
Have a look at the map.
Let's hit the streets and keep promoting!
Hiring a secretary will improve your influence and get tasks done more efficiently! Try it now?
Now let's assign a new spokesperson to promote our film!
Your spokesperson is ready. Let's promote this movie!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Let's perform roadshow here!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
We've completed all advertising events in this city, we can cover it now!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Check out the requirements for brand ambassadors.
Here you can select a qualified actor as brand ambassador.
Here you can view current box office receipts for your currently showing movies.
Let's select this city for now!
A major marketing campaign is now being launched in this city!
Let's make another great movie!
Let's start by expanding the top floor!
Here you can view the buzz around currently showing movies.
If you get enough buzz, you could eve earn extra reward items!
Here you can view the earnings situation for currently showing movies.
Come on, tap to collect your earnings!
Let's take a look at our market territories!
Select a city you already covered!
We can collect our city earnings here!
Let's expand the top floor!
First, let's take a look at our operations.
Let's see what merchandise we can produce.
Select a production line to start producing. Then all you need to do is wait!
Let's expand the top floor!
Let's upgrade the Film Studio!
A Biz Dev Center would allow us to improve our production lines by forging new relationships with other providers. Let's expand the top floor!
Let's enter the Green Room!
Upgrade selected actor to Lv.20!
You know the drill by now, film another great masterpiece in the studio!
Here we can see the leaderbord of our current block!
Let's take a look at our operations.
Here we can check received orders.
Orders have time limits. Once the limit is reached orders will be forfeited. Complete them in time to maximize your income!
Tap the box to put required items into it!
Let's complete this order now!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Finish advertising in all the streets first!
Now let's begin our roadshow!
We've completed all advertising events in this city, we can cover it now!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Check out the requirements for brand ambassadors.
Here you can select three qualified actors as brand ambassadors.
We need more space to build our Office. Let's expand the top floor!
Let's take a look at our operations first.
Here you can see current adminstrative issues.
Let's keep the table clean from paperworks!
Let's take a look at our market areas!
Return to New York!
Not too bad. Keep collecting these earnings as time goes by.
Open up the operations tab.
Here's the merchandise we can produce.
Select a production line and start producing now! Then all we have to do is wait for it to get made.
Let's expand the top floor!
Let's take a look at our operations.
We can receive our fans here!
Let's find the actor this fan expects to see!
Now we can sign contract with new theaters!
Let's look at our company's current condition!
Tap here to sign new theater!
We can come here when we need more Moviedollars!
Here, try it out!
Let's film this great screenplay we received!
We'll receive many rewards after finishing all main tasks!
Let's expand our screenplay collection!
Send our Set PA to arrange training courses for our actors!
Let's take a look at our operations.
We can arrange meetings here!
Let's enter the Green Room!
Select the actor you want to train!
Selected actor will be trained here!
Let's enter the Green Room!
Which actor do you want to send gft to?
You can view your properties here!
Send gift to selected actor to make them more loyal to you!
Let's enter the Training Room!
Let's enter the Green Room!
Select actor to train their skills!
You can view the skills of your actor here!
Upgrade selected actor's skills!
Let's take a look at our operations.
Let's take a look at our operations.
Let's check out the leaderboard of companies in this block!
We can like the top 3 companies!
Let's check out the leaderboard of movies filmed today!
We can like the top 3 movies!
Let's check the Block overview!
Look, there's our competition reward for today!
Let's take a look at our operations.
The more orders we completed, the more profit for us!
We can gift Moviedollars to our cooperator when they're in need.
We can check our cooperation quests here!
Let's complete a cooperation order!
We've been away from film studio for some time, thus no order for now. Let's shoot a movie first!
All our movies were finished showing! We need to film a new movie to gain earnings from it!
